burlap.domain.singleagent.gridworld

Class GridWorldVisualizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.domain.singleagent.gridworld.GridWorldVisualizer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MacroCellVisualizer

    public class GridWorldVisualizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Returns a visualizer for grid worlds in which walls are rendered as black squares or black lines, the agent is a gray circle and the location objects are colored squares. The size of the cells scales to the size of the domain and the size of the canvas.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GridWorldVisualizer.CellPainter
      A painter for a grid world cell which will fill the cell with a given color and where the cell position is indicated by the x and y attribute for the mapped object instance
      static class  GridWorldVisualizer.LocationPainter
      A painter for location objects which will fill the cell with a given color and where the cell position is indicated by the x and y attribute for the mapped object instance
      static class  GridWorldVisualizer.MapPainter
      A static painter class for rendering the walls of the grid world as black squares or black lines for 1D walls.

    • Method Detail

      • getVisualizer

        @Deprecated
public static Visualizer getVisualizer(Domain d,
                                  int[][] map)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns visualizer for a grid world domain with the provided wall map. This method has been deprecated because the domain is no longer necessary. Use the getVisualizer(int[][]) method instead.
        Parameters:
        d - the domain of the grid world
        map - the wall map matrix where 0s indicate it is clear of walls, 1s indicate a full cell wall in that cell, 2s indicate a 1D north wall, 3s indicate a 1D east wall, and 4s indicate a 1D north and east wall.
        Returns:
        a grid world domain visualizer

      • getVisualizer

        Returns visualizer for a grid world domain with the provided wall map.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a grid world domain visualizer

      • getRenderLayer

        @Deprecated
public static StateRenderLayer getRenderLayer(Domain d,
                                         int[][] map)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns state render layer for a gird world domain with the provided wall map. This method has been deprecated because the domain object is no longer necessary. Use the getRenderLayer(int[][]) method instead.
        Parameters:
        d - the domain of the grid world
        map - the wall map matrix where 0s indicate it is clear of walls, 1s indicate a full cell wall in that cell, 2s indicate a 1D north wall, 3s indicate a 1D east wall, and 4s indicate a 1D north and east wall.
        Returns:
        a grid world domain state render layer
